title: The 10 Best Makeup Gift Sets You'll Want to Keep for Yourself
description: Major savings on Hourglass, Merit, Charlotte Tilbury and more.
excerpt: We found the best makeup gift sets, including unique gift sets, the best luxury makeup sets, and great travel gift sets.

1

Best for a Full Face

Hourglass The Full Face Edit Set

Cons
  • May not be suitable for every skin tone

Hourglass’s holiday gift set is truly a treat. It comes with five full-size hero products, including glitter eyeshadow, an all-purpose face brush, and one of the Ambient Lighting Unlocked Palettes the brand debuted earlier this year. Also included is a large makeup bag to hold all of the products and the rest of your everyday makeup routine.

Includes: Face palette, face brush, mascara, single eyeshadow, makeup bag

Nordstrom rating: TK

An ELLE editor says: “Hourglass is hands down one of my top makeup brands of all time. Every single formula I’ve tried from its collections has become a fast favorite, and I’m always excited to see the brand’s new holiday palettes each year. When used together, all of the shades melt into the skin and give it a soft, glowy finish that looks like a real-life filter. Another standout in this kit is the glitter eyeshadow. I don’t think I’ve ever not gotten a compliment while wearing one of the shades. Plus, considering the chic faux-leather makeup bag that comes with this set, I may just have to gift one to myself.”—Carol Lee, ELLE.com associate beauty e-commerce writer

2

Best Luxury

Dior Lip and Cheek Pink Glow Ritual Set

Pros
  • Contains two full-size products
Cons
  • Only one shade option

In case you missed it, TikTok has helped make Dior’s Addict Lip Glow Oil and Rosy Glow Blush two of the most covetable luxury makeup items on the market. This set features both of the viral products and a Dior makeup bag—who could resist?

Includes: Blush, lip oil

Sephora rating: 3/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “If I wanted to introduce someone to the magic of Dior makeup, this set would be my pick. It contains two of the most popular products, and both formulas have blown me away in the past. The bright pink blush transforms into a flattering flush on my cheeks, while the lip oil feels so plush on my lips and makes my pout look as juicy as a peach.”—Carol Lee

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

3

Best Lipstick Set

Merit The Dress Code Set

Cons
  • Shades are limited-edition

Merit lipstick enthusiasts, listen up! This set includes three new limited-edition shades and a limited-edition formula meant to tint your lips with a wash of color. The other lipsticks come in a nourishing satin finish and a soft matte one in gorgeous hues that are great for fall, the holidays, and beyond.

Includes: 3 lipsticks

An ELLE editor says: “If I could only wear one brand of lipstick for the rest of my life, it would be Merit. The formulas are exactly what I want them to be (nourishing, non-drying, the perfect balance of pigment), and it’s like Merit pulled the shades right off of a ‘90s Pinterest board. This set has been calling my name since the first time I saw it, and the fact that it includes a new formula and shade is the cherry on top.”—Carol Lee

4

Best TikTok-Famous

Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Lip and Cheek Secrets Set

Pros
  • Products are cruelty-free
Cons
  • Only one full-size item

Whether you’ve been curious about these products or want a travel-sized version to take with you on your adventures, this makeup set is an ideal opportunity to try a few viral products from Charlotte Tilbury. Apply all of them at once, and you’ll end up with a glamorous, high-shine finish nobody will be able to look away from.

Includes: Travel-size bronzer, travel-size highlighter, travel-size lipstick, lip gloss

Sephora rating: 3.3/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “I have to admit that I totally bought into the hype of Charlotte Tilbury’s Pillow Talk range—and I’m glad I did. Every time I wear the products, I feel like they help me create a look fit for a sexy yet demure princess. The Beauty Light Wands, in particular, have lived up to their reputation—they blend in like a dream and make my cheeks look incredibly glowy under all lighting conditions.”—Carol Lee

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

5

Best Lip Oil Set

Saie Glossybounce Lip Gloss Oil Duo

Cons
  • Shades may not appear as pigmented on all skin tones

We all know and love Saie for its nourishing, high-performance products, and the Glossybounce Lip Gloss Oil is a true winner. Each tube has an infusion of hyaluronic acid, jojoba oil, and shea butter to moisturize and plump your pout. This set includes fan-favorite shade Kiss, a pinky nude, and a new limited-edition one called Crush, a bright blue-red.

Includes: 2 lip oils

An ELLE editor says: “I’ve spoken about this a million times by now, but my one true makeup nemesis is a sticky, gooey lip gloss. I just can’t stand the sensation. Even if they look incredible, I find myself wiping sticky lip glosses off after a few tortured minutes. Discovering the lip oil from Saie was a huge relief because it feels like a nourishing, non-sticky lip balm, but it shines like a gloss.”—Carol Lee

6

Best Lip Gloss Set

Fenty Beauty by Rihanna The Gloss Bomb Vault

Pros
  • Includes a variety of gloss formulas
Cons
  • Some may dislike scent

This option from Fenty features ten gorgeous shades of one of the brand’s most beloved products, the Gloss Bomb, in three different formulas: Universal Lip Luminizer, Heat Universal Lip Luminizer + Plumper, and Ice Cooling Lip Luminizer. It’s a mix of classic tried-and-true hues and new ones that you can only get in this set. If you haven’t tried any of Fenty’s glosses or only have the original, Fenty Glow, this may be your sign to splurge and try the many other shades the brand offers.

Includes: 10 lip glosses

An ELLE editor says: “Fenty’s lip glosses were one of the first non-drugstore options I ever tried and fell in love with. I’m still mesmerized by just how shiny my lips look when I have one on that I swear that I can almost see my reflection in them.”—Carol Lee

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

7

Best Makeup Pencil Set

Make Up For Ever Mini Artist Color Pencil Lipliner & Eyeliner Kit

Pros
  • Pencils are long-lasting
Cons
  • Does not include sharpener

The beauty of Make Up For Ever’s Artist Color Pencils is that you can pretty much use them anywhere on your face, including your eyes and your lips. In a pinch, you can even contour or add some color to your cheeks and eyes with them. This set has five mini versions you can slip into your purse for when you’re on-the-go so you’ll always be prepared.

Includes: 5 mini lip and eye pencils

Sephora rating: 5/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “If you have as many lip liners as I do, it takes a while to get through one. But even if you don’t these will last you a while because they’re so long-lasting and a little goes a long way. Waxier formulas like this one have a tenacity that softer formulas sometimes don’t have, and Make Up For Ever lip liners have stuck with me through 12-hour work days, greasy meals, and countless sips of water.”—Carol Lee

8

Best Eyeshadow Palette

Danessa Myricks Beauty Lightwork VI The Freedom Palette

Pros
  • Compatible with all other Danessa Myricks palettes
Cons
  • One reviewer noted that a pan fell out on its own

As you can see, this product is basically three palettes in one and contains all of the metallic, shimmery, and duo-chrome shades you might ever need. Here’s a little secret: The magnetic label on the cover of the palette has a mirror on the other side. Plus, you can remove one of the three mini palettes inside the larger case and place the label on top to just take one section with you while traveling. As if that wasn’t enough, the pans are compatible with the brand’s other square-pan palettes, so you can switch out some of the shades as needed. Danessa Myricks never ceases to amaze us.

Includes: 18-pan palette

Sephora rating: 4.9/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “This palette is so much fun. The images online don’t do it justice. Even in the pan, you don’t always see how multi-dimensional these shadows are. On the eyes? Gorgeous! I’m having so much fun playing with this palette. The actual functionality of the palette is so cool, too. Love that you can change the size and configuration.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

9

Best Makeup Spray Duo

MAC Cosmetics Full-Size Fix+ Setting Spray Set

Pros
  • Provides a dewy finish
Cons
  • Nozzle does not always spray evenly

MAC’s Fix+ isn’t necessarily a setting spray. Instead, think of it like a dewy, hydrating mist that melts all of your makeup together and hydrates any dry or rough spots your skin might have. You can also mix it in with your eyeshadow to up the pigment or spray it onto bare skin to give it a boost of moisture. This set includes that original formula, plus a full-size Fix+ Stay Over Alcohol-Free 24-Hour Setting Spray, which actually is meant to keep your makeup looking fresh and intact for over 12 hours.

Includes: 2 setting sprays

Nordstrom rating: 4.7/5 stars

A Nordstrom reviewer says: “This was the first MAC product I’ve ever purchased—I already want to buy two more bottles. First, this is not a setting spray that will ‘set’ your makeup. This is to be used as a primer or a finishing mist that will [make] your face more dewy and have a healthy, youthful glow. With all the steps to makeup, foundation, contouring, powder, etc., your face can [have] a powdery, cakey, almost lifeless look. This mist will help give your final look more dewy and healthy without looking all powdered up. Also, this is great if you have dry patches! It’s very refreshing [and has] a nice cucumber smell. I definitely recommend this for anyone who wants a dewy, healthy look!”

10

Best Tinted Lip Balm Set

Summer Fridays The Holiday Lip Butter Balm Set

Pros
  • Curved applicator hugs lips
Cons
  • Some may dislike scents

Summer Fridays’s lip balms are social media-famous for a reason—their seed butter-rich formulas instantly cure flakiness and dryness, and they come in a variety of flattering shades. This trio has clear, pink, and red lip butters. If you look at the price of the set, you’re “basically getting a balm for free,” as one reviewer pointed out.

Includes: 3 lip balms

Sephora rating: 5/5 stars

A Sephora reviewer says: “I was on the fence because I own so many lip things at the moment. Just add it to your cart, because it’s so worth it. I love all the scents, and you are getting so much. It will last you awhile. Treat yourself.”

Carol Lee is the Associate Beauty E-Commerce Writer at ELLE.com, where she covers all things beauty and personal care. Before joining the team, she was an editor at Food Network Magazine and HGTV Magazine and ran the beauty section at The Pioneer Woman. Carol received her bachelor’s degree in Journalism from New York University and was one of the first customers to visit Glossier’s flagship store in New York’s Soho neighborhood. Over the years, she’s tested countless makeup, hair, and skin care products, and written hundreds of articles covering the beauty space, from pieces about the trendiest launches to roundups of the best products on the market.
